description: This course is designed to get the inexperienced up and running with Pro Tools by including templates, presets and key commands as well as teach the Intermediate Pro Tools a more efficient quicker way to work. We will negate your fear of thinking that Pro Tools is hard to use and show how truly "Easy" and fun it can be! We will walk you through the Entire Process as we work with a real live Artist "Kid Krush" and show you the "Easy Way" of how to complete a full song in Pro Tools. We will take you through the layout of Pro Tools, How to Record Vocals to how to mix your final song down and prepare it for the world to hear. Thank you for taking your music career to a new height!
title: Record A Song In Pro Tools-The Easy Way
